Verb *kill*
************

Documentation for the kill verb in */cmds/verbs/kill.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``kill``
 |  ``kill <someone>``
 |  ``kill <someone> with <something>``

Kill someone - possibly with the candlestick in the kitchen.
